mapper.select: SELECT * FROM POST ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(POST_NO)
SELECT POST_NO, (LPAD(' ', 5*(LEVEL-1)) || TITLE) AS EDITTITLE, (LEVEL) AS POST_LEVEL FROM POST START WITH PARENT_POST_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR POST_NO = PARENT_POST_NO ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(POST_NO)

SELECT POST_NO, GN, (LPAD('→ ', 2*(LEVEL-1), '-') || TITLE) AS TITLE, (LEVEL) AS POST_LEVEL, USERID, REG_DT FROM POST WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no} START WITH PARENT_POST_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR POST_NO = PARENT_POST_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY GN DESC, TO_NUMBER(POST_NO) ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (POST_NO, PARENT_POST_NO, USERID, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DT, DELETE_FLAG, BOARD_NO, GN, POST_LEVEL) VALUES (#{post_no}, #{parent_post_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid}, #{title}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{delete_flag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{board_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{post_level, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
